Class IncidenceArrayGraph

java.lang.Object
graph.IncidenceArrayGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
UndirectedGraph
public class IncidenceArrayGraph extends Object implements UndirectedGraph
Represents a graph using an incidence array.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    IncidenceArrayGraph(int maxNbOfVertices)
    Constructs an incidence array graph with a maximum number of vertices.
